alfredsnippet.snippet:
def pieplot(df1,y,palette='terrain',startangle=90,
            figsize=(8,8),autopct="%1.0f%%"):

    """ Pie plot
    titanic = sns.load_dataset('titanic')
    df1 = titanic.groupby('sex')['survived'].sum()
    """
    df1.plot(kind='pie',
             y=y,
             figsize=figsize,
             autopct=autopct,
             shadow=False,
             startangle=startangle,
             rotatelabels=True,
             explode=None,
             colors=sns.color_palette(palette,len(df1)),
             textprops={'fontsize': 14},
             wedgeprops={"linewidth":2,"edgecolor":"white"});

    plt.ylabel('')
    plt.title('Pie plot of {}'.format(y),fontsize=14)
